objects.description: [Industroyer](https://collaborate.mitre.org/attackics/index.php/Software/S0001), has a destructive wiper that 'overwrites all ICS configuration files across the hard drives and all mapped network drives specifically targeting ABB PCM600 configuration files'.(Citation: Dragos Industroyer Jun 2017)

external_references.description: Dragos Inc.. (2017, June 13). Industroyer - Dragos - 201706: Analysis of the Threat to Electic Grid Operations. Retrieved September 18, 2017.
